content: I think I'll also ask my followers to share their favorite types of upcycled materials or what they'd like to see me create next. This will help me understand their preferences and get inspiration for new pieces. Something like: "What's your favorite type of upcycled material? Would you like to see me create more pieces from old keys, fabric scraps, or something else? Let me know in the comments below and I might just create a new piece inspired by your suggestion!"
